channel.title: Comments on: How to create Ambient Declarations in TypeScript Tutorial
channel.description: Manage Your Code Snippets with codeBelt | Code Examples / Tutorials / Articles

item.title: By: robert
item.dc:creator: robert
item.description: Hey, thanks! I've contributed to DefinitelyTyped. I added the <a href="https://codebelt.github.io/blog/typescript/typescript-ambient-declarations-class-for-greensock/" rel="nofollow">GreenSock TypeScript</a> file.
item.content:encoded: Hey, thanks! I’ve contributed to DefinitelyTyped. I added the GreenSock TypeScript file.

item.title: By: robert
item.dc:creator: robert
item.description: Thanks! Very helpful — I found this, a number of declaration files already done -- https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped -- perhaps helpful to you.
item.content:encoded: Thanks! Very helpful — I found this, a number of declaration files already done — https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped — perhaps helpful to you.
